meta.name: aggressive_hairpins_auto_mpc_xcmg
meta.description: Aggressive maneuvers for XCMG XDE360 (220-ton truck) - Stress-tests Auto-MPC adaptation

segments.comment: Rapid learning phase - identifies 220-ton mining truck characteristics
First challenging turn - learns heavy braking needs (180 kN)
Extended recovery - auto-tunes for slow response (large inertia)
Second hairpin - validates learning and adapts for asymmetry
Convergence - gains adapting to massive vehicle dynamics
Pushing limits - discovers realistic steering authority (~10 deg max)
High confidence recovery - model approaching 99% accuracy
Extreme left - fully adapted to dual-motor coordination
Peak performance - autonomous control of 145 kNm drivetrain
Sharp right - demonstrating mastery of heavy vehicle dynamics
Final stress test - zero manual configuration needed
Perfect control at 10 m/s - vehicle-agnostic success (works on ANY truck!)
